predefined_profiles.name: He Bai
predefined_profiles.public profile: He Bai is a newly arrived interrogator at the General Affairs Office, and he has taken over interrogation duties right from the start. Despite being new, his methods are sharp and he's been secretly mentored by Master Yelan.
predefined_profiles.goal: Extract vital information from the suspect in the shortest time possible.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Harbors a secret admiration for Master Yelan, who trained him.

predefined_profiles.name: Little Girl
predefined_profiles.public profile: A fourteen-year-old girl, being interrogated as a suspect, who wandered here and was manipulated by villains to transport information for them. She is highly wary and doesn't open up easily, yet is very grateful and loyal.
predefined_profiles.goal: Complete the tasks assigned by the organization.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Orphaned since childhood, she has been relying on no one. Villains provided her food, which led her to unintentionally depend on them.

scenario: A new task at the General Affairs Office is to root out a mole. Master Yelan has already identified the little girl within the office, and it's He Bai's job to extract information from her.

profile.name: Master Yelan
profile.public profile: He Bai's mentor, a secretive figure in the General Affairs Office, holding a position of great authority, not easily approachable, sees potential in He Bai as his successor.
profile.private profile: Occasionally feels heartened when facing He Bai.
profile.goal: To train He Bai as his successor.

dialog.content: The new mission in the General Affairs Office is to root out the mole. He Bai's mentor, Master Yelan, has already pinpointed a young girl in the office and wants He Bai to extract information from her.
The one you need to interrogate this time is a teenage girl.
A girl? Are you sure you've got the right person?
Hmph, I've long suspected something's off with her. Don't underestimate her. Despite her age, she keeps her lips sealed tight. Surely you won't be too softhearted to interrogate her?
Master, rest assured, I won’t let you down.
(pitifully) Let me go... What do you want from me...

content.content: There are so many people to interrogate, I've got no time to waste on you. Let’s go straight to harsh methods, I bet you'll talk!

question: #question# What did He Bai say that showed he was skilled in effectively using his time to achieve his goals?

content.content: Since you’re not confessing, we'll just lock you up for a month, I bet you'll talk!
It's rare to have a prisoner to interrogate; I ought to enjoy this.
Don’t be afraid, little girl. I mean you no harm; I only want to understand some things.
(first comforting the girl) Don't be afraid, we won't harm you. Are you hungry? Want some snacks?

question: #question# What did He Bai say to make the girl feel warmth and let her guard down?

content.content: (with the kindest expression) I am the best interrogator in the General Affairs Office, I advise you to be truthful so you can leave sooner.
You must be up to no good either, carrying messages at such a young age! But don't be afraid. Tell me what you know, and I won't make this hard for you.
(smiling) You won't get a drop of water or anything to eat until you name the mastermind.
This is too pitiful, how can we treat a young girl like this? Even if I’m punished, I can’t stand to see you suffer. Don’t worry; I will release you right now!

question: #question# What did He Bai say that showed he would uphold his morals even at the risk of being punished by his superiors?

content.content: I’m just doing my job; hurry up and tell me what intelligence you have. Don't make it hard on me, or we’ll both suffer the consequences.
I know you’re likely innocent and very pitiful, but there's nothing I can do for you. Just confess.
You’re so young, how did you stray onto such a crooked path? There's no saving you! Won’t you confess?

dialog.content: (groans in pain from the electric shock) Ahhh...
We're just getting started, take it slow, hahaha...
I can't take it anymore... I can't...
Are you going to talk or not?

content.content: (stops the electric shock) Why has your face turned so pale so quickly? It's not even been a minute.

question: #question# How can He Bai's attention to detail during interrogation be demonstrated?

content.content: How is it? The electric shock from my company isn't easy to handle, right?
(stops the electric shock) Will you talk or not? Who's the mole? Speak up!
According to the usual practice, I'll shock you for five minutes, until your face turns pale!
Hmph, this time I'm going to make sure you understand who's in charge until you confess who the mole is!

question: #question# How can He Bai's determination to complete his task be demonstrated?

content.content: The electric shock isn't pleasant, is it? Want to try water torture? Our methods aren't simple.
I don't want to treat a little girl like this, just confess, any terms will do.
Why does your face look a bit off? Forget it, seeing you're a little girl, I'll let you go.

dialog.content: (barely conscious) Help me...
Already can't take it? Stop pretending.
(disoriented) ...
What are you saying?
(disoriented) Let me go...

content.content: When the detainee is incoherent, we can't continue with the interrogation. You can rest for now.

question: #question# What should He Bai say to show he's an officer who follows protocol?

content.content: Let you go? An interrogator as skilled as I am won't let you off that easily!
(slapping the girl's face) Wake up! You haven't told me the intel yet! You can sleep after you spill!
When the detainee can't handle electric torture, we switch to something stronger. Let's try water torture.
Tell me everything you know, and you'll be released immediately.

question: #question# What should He Bai say to demonstrate his clear objective of obtaining information?

content.content: This is just the beginning, I'm going to take my time with you, hahaha...
Picking up tricks like transporting intel at such a young age, this is the outcome you deserve.
I'm tired, I'll let you off today, but I'll be interrogating you again tomorrow.

dialog.content: After resting, the little girl regained her senses. Out of fear of further punishment, she confessed the information to He Bai. Although He Bai obtained the information, he was scolded by his master for taking too long.
(gasping) I said... I said...
The little girl revealed the mole, but since she was delirious during the confession, the higher-ups quickly realized the information was unreliable, and He Bai did not complete the mission.
(turning pale, gasping for breath) You... you... you... cruel monster!

The little girl, already weakened from living on the streets and plagued by illness, couldn't withstand the electric shock interrogation. She soon passed away, and not only did you fail to obtain any information, but your inhumane methods led to a report and subsequent dismissal.
(gulp) ...snacks?
(releasing the little girl and giving her a plate of snacks) I got these all for you. I knew you'd be hungry. Here, eat up.
(devours the snacks) Thank you.
Alright, now tell me, who are the people that asked you to deliver the intel?
I don't know.

content.content: Hey there, girl. What's your name?

question: #question# How should He Bai speak to show he can start a conversation even in social dilemmas?

content.content: In case you haven't heard of me, I'm the most skilled interrogator in the Department of General Affairs.
Clueless and yet you help in transporting intel; you deserve to be locked up here!
If you don't point out the mole, you'll be locked up here forever!
Hmph, you don't appreciate my kindness, so I guess I can't go easy on you! Are you going to talk? Who asked you to do their bidding? Speak!

question: #question# How could He Bai demonstrate adaptability in interrogation?

content.content: Don't be afraid, I won't do anything to you; you don't need to be on guard.
It's alright, you must just be tired. Take a rest and think about who gave you the orders.
No rush, no rush, have a few more bites of snacks! Think it over slowly!

dialog.content: I don't have a name...
How can you not have a name?
I'm an orphan, I don't even know my own birthday.
So how have you been living?
(cautiously) I've been wandering the streets since I was little, raised on charity from many households.

content.content: All these years on the streets, it must have been really tough for you. You've done amazingly well.

question: #question# How can He Bai express himself to show he's thinking from the little girl's perspective?

content.content: Everyone has their fate, and this is yours, can't blame others for it.
I didn't expect your life to be this tragic, but as a competent interrogator, I won't go easy on you.
With a background like yours, without hard work, you'll never make it out!
Can you tell me who asked you to deliver the information?

question: #question# How can He Bai express himself to show he hasn't forgotten to carry out his task?

content.content: I can't imagine how you've managed to survive on the streets... The person who asked you to deliver information is too heartless, not caring for you.
Where do you usually stay?
It's too sad, why don't you come work for our General Affairs Department? We can pay you double what you get for delivering information.

dialog.content: Thank you, I know what you want, but I can't tell you.
Why are you protecting him so much?
I'm just a street beggar, and he's the only one who noticed me. He was the first person to take me to a restaurant.
He's only trying to use you.
Even so, I'm still grateful to him. You don't need to say more, I won't betray him.

content.content: As long as you tell us, we'll arrange your food, clothing, and housing. You won't need to beg anymore.

question: #question# What can He Bai say to persuade the little girl to reveal the information?

content.content: It's just a meal? I can take you to a restaurant too. Let's go now!
Are you really so easily bought with such small favors? You must be gullible!
He's just using you, stop defending him! Tell me what you know and I'll take you to eat!
Alright, I don't have the energy to keep going like this with you. How about we go straight to torture, water or electric? You pick!

question: #question# How can He Bai show that he knows how to adjust strategies to conserve energy?

content.content: Oh, you won't speak? I've got plenty of time and energy to wait. I don't believe you won't talk.
Then let's starve you for a few days and slowly wear you down, I've got all the time and energy for this.
I'm begging you, please help out, just say it, let's not waste time and energy.
Alright, I completely understand how you feel, are you hungry now? How about I take you to eat something?
It's just a meal? I can take you to a restaurant now, you can eat whatever you want, I'll make sure you're satisfied, and I'll offer you even more!
He's just using you, stop defending him! Tell me what you know and I'll take you to eat!

dialog.content: Your offer is very tempting, but I can't betray my benefactor.
Aren't you afraid of what I might do to you if you don't speak?
(shaking her head) You're a good person; you wouldn't do anything bad.

He Bai's long-abandoned sense of morality was stirred by the little girl. He couldn't bring himself to torture her. In the end, he didn't get any information, but he was relieved to discover he still had his ethics.
You... you wouldn't do that...
I'm sorry, this is my job. If you don't cooperate, I have no choice but to do this.
(Looking at the instruments of torture, trembling) I'll tell you.
The little girl reluctantly described the events to He Bai, but she did help He Bai identify the mole within the organization, much to Master Yelan's satisfaction.
I told you, I don't know.
We never grab the wrong person.
Please let me go.
You know what the conditions are for releasing you.
(shaking her head) I can't tell you.
Despite all his efforts, He Bai couldn't get the little girl to reveal who the mole was. Master Yelan was disappointed in He Bai for failing to handle even a little girl.
(Frightened, starts to cry loudly) Wahhhhhh...
He Bai was at a loss when the little girl suddenly burst into tears. Master Yelan was disappointed with He Bai for not being able to handle even a little girl.
You're such a good person, thank you!
He Bai let the little girl go, in the end getting no information, and was reprimanded for releasing a prisoner without authorization.
